revised_title: Obituary of Joseph Jackson Lister: A Pioneering Naturalist and Foraminifera Researcher
tldr: This obituary honors Joseph Jackson Lister, a distinguished naturalist and zoologist, who made significant contributions to the study of Foraminifera morphology. Lister's keen observation skills and deep understanding of organic life led him to conduct groundbreaking research on the life-history of Foraminifera, earning him a worldwide reputation in the scientific community. His dedication to the study of minute organisms and his ability to accumulate knowledge through direct study of nature made him a respected figure in the field of zoology.
